text: any of you ever run into successfully uploading a SF, but any changes afterward donâ€™t reflect?
Is this resolved with cache control?
I personally haven't run into this issue before but one thing that I will say is that you should give serverless functions up to 20 seconds to finish the upload process before testing
HubSpot tells you that the function uploaded fine but then they need to turn around and upload to aws

I waited 30 minutes. It was a simple axios call too. Nothing crazy / not much room for user error. I added a console log to the beginning of the function in order to debug with hs logs and it finally started updating
Very interesting, if you delete the console logs does it upload or stay the same?
